title: Resolve an Invoice Dispute
description: A customer is disputing an item on their invoice, claiming they were overcharged.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's invoice and the original sales order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up both the invoice and the sales order for comparison.

tasks.description: Compare the pricing on the order with the pricing on the invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the price on the invoice matches the price on the order the customer signed.

tasks.description: Explain the charge to the customer, referencing the agreed-upon price on the sales order, and provide a copy of the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clarifies the charge for the customer, resolving the dispute.
